biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.control.processor

Class AbstractSourceTreePreparationProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.control.processor.AbstractSourceTreePreparationProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreCompilationProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SourceTreePreparationProcessor, SourceTreeWithCodeCachingPreparationProcessor

    public abstract class AbstractSourceTreePreparationProcessor
extends Object
implements PreCompilationProcessor
    Helps in implementing pre compilation processors responsible for preparing source file with imports (deep, imports of imports). It executes preparation only for expired sources.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected SourceExpirationChecker expirationChecker
      The checker responsible for determining if the source file expired.
      protected SourceImportsCache importsCache
      The cache responsible for storing source files imports lists.
      protected SourceFactory sourceFactory
      The factory responsible for creating new instances of the LessSource.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        public void prepare(LessSource source)
        Prepares a source file to the compilation process. This method delegates work to the prepare(LessSource, Set) (set is empty).
        Specified by:
        prepare in interface PreCompilationProcessor
        Parameters:
        source - the source file.
        Since:
        1.0

      • prepare

        protected void prepare(LessSource source,
                       Set<String> preparedSourcesPaths)
        Prepares a source file to the compilation process. This method is called recursively for the source and all of its imports. To avoid imports loop, it processes only sources which path is not contained by the set.
        Parameters:
        source - the source file.
        preparedSourcesPaths - set with prepared sources path.
        Since:
        1.0

      • prepareWhenExpired

        protected abstract void prepareWhenExpired(LessSource source,
                                           Set<String> preparedSourcesPaths)
        Prepares a source file to the compilation process. Called only when source expired (determines by checker). If this method should prepare the source import, then you must call prepare(LessSource, Set).
        Parameters:
        source - the source file.
        preparedSourcesPaths - set with prepared sources paths.
        Since:
        1.0
